Here are some visits, workshops, and conferences I went to.

Moduli spaces of vector bundles and curves in Cergy-Pontoise, France, 2023.

GLEN in Glasgow, UK, 2024.

UKAG in Lancaster, UK, 2024.

Research visit to University of Heidelberg, Germany, 2024.

Stratifications of Higgs bundle moduli spaces in Santiago, Spain, 2025.

VBAC - Quivers and sheaves in Utrecht, The Netherlands, 2025.

AGQ Retreat, 2025.

Group actions and symplectic singularities in Lille, France, 2025.

Enumerative geometry and geometric representation theory in Pisa, Italy, 2025.

AGQ Conference in Glasgow, UK, 2025 (I gave a 5 minute talk).

GEARS in Glasgow, UK, 2025 (I gave a talk on complementary polyhedra).

ICMS Geometry, Higher Structures, Physics in Edinburgh, UK.
